description:
Norman Reedus rocks a shirt and tie while attending the 2013 Wired Store Opening on Tuesday (December 3) in New York City.穿着衬衣打着领导的Norman Reedus出现在了纽约举行的2013 Wired Store开幕式上。

The Walking Dead actor was joined by the always handsome Sebastian Stan.和他一起出现的还有帅气的Sebastian Stan。

On the same night, Norman celebrated his cover for Men’s Fitness‘ December 2013 issue at The Spot in Trump Soho.当晚，Norman还展示了自己在《Mens's Fitness》12月刊的封面。

“This is the role of a lifetime. I’ve done about 40 films. I’m having the best time I’ve ever had on a job in my life. I’ll be Daryl until I’m 85 years old if they’ll have me,” Norman shared in the mag about his Walking Dead character.“这是一个可以演一生的角色。我这辈子及已经演了40多部电影，这是我这辈子演过的最好角色。如果剧组需要，我愿意演Daryl演到85岁，”Norman在杂志中的采访中聊到自己在《行尸走肉》中的角色时说。

title: 《行尸走肉》弩哥愿意演弩哥到85岁
